main.name: Ugur (Ian) Pekunsal
main.description: I am a recent software engineering graduate, seeking employment in the Greater Toronto Area
main.bio: I came to Canada from Turkey on my own in 2013 when I was 16. That same year, our high school got a new computer science teacher from Waterloo University. My first experience with coding started from there and continued on through college and my personal life. Now I am offering website design and development services to clients across Canada and Turkey. Most people I work for want easily managed CMS systems, mainly WordPress. This trend limits my creativity and impedes me from advancing my skills. I want to expand my knowledge and pursue a career in the web development area where I can utilize my skills with node.js, typescript, and either native JS or along with libraries such as React.js or Angular JS. In the near future, I think I can be an asset to the team I work for and propel the company to advance.
main.contactmessage: If you have any additional questions, please contact me!

resume.skillmessage: Below is a list of my current skills. This list is an indication of how fast I am with solving problems utilizing these technologies.

work.title: Web Development Intern
work.description: ● Wrote custom HTML, PHP, CSS, and JavaScript for existing websites. ● Assisted in troubleshooting issues on web-based systems. ● Tested and gave feedback on new and existing technologies.

work.title: Brand Ambassador
work.description: ● Educated customers of various Muskoka and Beau's products via one-on-one interaction. ● Submitted detailed, accurate reports for inventory, payroll hours, and material used.
